name: Domum Venadi
description:
You find yourself in a house  you don't remember entering. You need to find a way to leave the house, by investigating and trying to find the secrets of this cursed home. But be careful, even if you escape the house, your safety isn't guaranteed. What you did in the house will affect what happens when you leave. It isn't about leaving the house, but escaping it, because nobody that tries to leave ever lives to tell the tale. 

Explore the house, and find secrets within it to get one of ten endings, and uncover the story behind it. Thanks for playing, and enjoy!
